entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
